noticehandler.notice-config.message: Notice Settings - [Notice Toggle: $1 / Interval: $2 / Message Trigger: $3 / Amount: $4 / Say notice in offline chat: $5]

noticehandler.notice-disabled.offline.message: Notices will no longer be said while the stream is offline.

noticehandler.notice-edit-usage.message: Usage: !notice edit (notice id) (message) - Notice id's go from 0 to $1

noticehandler.notice-enabled.offline.message: Notices now be said while the stream is offline.

noticehandler.notice-get-usage.message: Usage: !notice get (notice id) - Notice id's go from 0 to $1

noticehandler.notice-interval-404.message: Notice interval needs to be more then 2 minutes.

noticehandler.notice-remove-usage.message: Usage: !notice remove (notice id) - Notice id's go from 0 to $1

noticehandler.notice-req-404.message: Notice req messages needs to at least 1.

noticehandler.notice-usage.message: Usage: !notice [add / get / remove / edit / config / interval / req / toggle / toggleoffline]
